review: Bought this as a replacement for aging Boxee Box. Loved that thing, but it was on its last legs and long since not supported.If you are a Prime customer and live in US (or use a proxy to US), this device works really well. Interface is nice and clean - though as many others have said, it's too bad that search functionality cannot be used by other programs (e.g. can't voice search in Netflix).Ability to install Kodi to view your local content is what makes this box truly well rounded. This allows you to both view your local media and stream various online content all in one clean interface.
author: T.V.D.

review: Although its a nice device, I have lots of problems with it.  It freezes on occasion and is very slow to load things and disconnects from the internet at least once a day(I run other devices on the same internet and they never disconnect).  I have had 2 remotes in 2 months and neither one has lasted more than 2 weeks.  I am also disappointed by the movies/tv shows that are free else where but cost a ton on here.  Movies that are 4 dollars to rent when I can go to Walmart and buy the dvd for 5 bucks and have it forever.  I have the fire stick as well which is WAY worse.  I plan on getting my parents a device to view netflix but it will not be a fire tv till they can improve the connectivity and reliability of the devices.
author: Ashley Tomey
